body_html:
Edit

\tensorflow\tools\proto_text

Add linkopts = ["-lm"] to cc_binary

So, you should have

cc_binary(
    name = "gen_proto_text_functions",
    srcs = ["gen_proto_text_functions.cc"],
    visibility = ["//tensorflow:internal"],
    deps = [
        ":gen_proto_text_functions_lib",
        "//tensorflow/core:lib",
    ],
    linkopts = ["-lm"],
)

After modified just build tensorflow normally.

body:
Edit 

> \tensorflow\tools\proto_text

Add `linkopts = ["-lm"]` to cc_binary

So, you should have

```
cc_binary(
    name = "gen_proto_text_functions",
    srcs = ["gen_proto_text_functions.cc"],
    visibility = ["//tensorflow:internal"],
    deps = [
        ":gen_proto_text_functions_lib",
        "//tensorflow/core:lib",
    ],
    linkopts = ["-lm"],
)
```

After modified just build tensorflow normally.
